<h3 id="X34612">X(34612) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: MANDART-INCIRCLE TO ABC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^3-2*(b+c)*a^2+(b+c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34612) = 2*X(8)+X(7354) = 4*X(10)-X(6284) = 2*X(40)+X(6253) = 2*X(355)+X(11826) = 3*X(3058)-2*X(34611) = X(3893)+2*X(10106) = 4*X(5690)-X(11827) = X(5691)+2*X(31777) = 2*X(10914)+X(10944) = X(10914)+2*X(17647) = 2*X(17579)+X(34689)
</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(34611).
</p>
<p>
Let A'B'C' be the intouch triangle of the extangents triangle, if ABC is acute.  A'B'C' is homothetic to ABC at X(55), and X(34612) is the centroid of A'B'C'.  (Randy Hutson, November 17, 2019)
</p>
<p>
X(34612) lies on these lines: {1,34699}, {2,11}, {3,31157}, {4,21031}, {5,31159}, {8,529}, {10,3683}, {12,5687}, {19,428}, {21,9710}, {30,40}, {35,24953}, {51,22278}, {56,5082}, {57,4863}, {65,519}, {31145,34605}, {31260,31493}, {31416,31448}, {32287,34319}</p>
<p>
X(34612) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {8, 17579}, {3625, 34637}, {3632, 34690}, {5434, 34720}, {6253, 34618}, {7354, 34689}, {11826, 34697}, {12245, 34617}, {12645, 34698}, {31145, 34605}<br>
X(34612) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (51, 22278), (3058, 2), (5434, 11112), (6284, 11113), (7354, 17579), (11113, 10), (34606, 3679), (34618, 40), (34689, 8), (34690, 18990), (34697, 355), (34699, 1), (34719, 15170), (34749, 5434)<br>
X(34612) = complement of X(34611)<br>
X(34612) = homothetic center of extangents triangle and reflection of intangents triangle in X(2)<br>
X(34612) = X(354)-of-extangents-triangle if ABC is acute<br>
X(34612) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 3434, 11235), (2, 4421, 4995), (2, 11235, 11), (2, 17784, 34607), (2, 34607, 55), (55, 2550, 3925), (55, 17784, 6154), (100, 2886, 5432), (100, 33110, 2886), (390, 26040, 4423), (1376, 3434, 11), (1376, 11235, 2), (2550, 17784, 55), (2550, 34607, 2), (3925, 6154, 55)<br>
</p>
